original_title: Not in This Town: The Improbable Rise of The Old Grey Wolf
overview: The original documentary of Dallas radio legend Mike Rhyner follows the improbable rise of the architect of SportsRadio 1310 The Ticket, the first all-sports station in Dallas which redefined the genre and begat a cultural revolution in our fair berg.  Written, directed and produced by former FOX4 sports reporter Crystal Vasquez, Not in This Town is a trip down memory lane with vintage footage of Rhyner’s unparalleled career plus interviews with luminaries who were along for the ride, such as George Dunham, Corby Davidson, Randy Galloway, Dale Hansen, Brad Sham, John Rody of KZEW-FM and, yes, Greg “The Hammer” Williams.
title: Not in This Town: The Improbable Rise of The Old Grey Wolf
